commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Lili! You're playing piano four-hands with Maki?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Sure am. I'm so excited to get to play with her.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: So when you say four hands...do you mean to say that the two of you will sprout extra arms to assist you?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: ...What on earth are you talking about? A four-hand concert is when two people play on one piano. I'd really like for you to come and listen to us.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Oh, r-riiight! I knew that! Well, it is only a given that I will preside over an event showcasing the growth of my little demon Lili!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: How many times do I have to tell you... Oh, whatever. Thanks! I'll play my heart out!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: My little demon Lili's recital will be a day to be remembered. I must give her my utmost support!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: While it frightens me to step foot into the magic metropolis Tokyo, Karin said she'd help me out, so...it should be okay, right?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: But she's not where she told me to meet her... This REALLY doesn't bode well for me!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: *Whimper* I've looked high and low and I still can't find Karin... I have found myself caught in the trap of the magic metropolis Tokyo!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh! There you are!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yoshiko! I've been waiting at the spot I told you for ages! You could've told me if you overslept, you know.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: N-No! I didn't oversleep! It's all magic metropolis Tokyo's fault!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Magic metro...? Like an enchanted subway? Oh, whatever, let's just start looking for Riko's present!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Eli and Kasumi will be getting a present for Maki, right? Hate to break it to them, but my present will FAR outshine anything they choose!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Pretty sure it's not a competition... Do you have something you want to give her in mind already?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I wanna give her some flowers. That's a fitting present for something like a piano recital, right?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see! I think you might be onto something there. There's a floral emporium I frequent near here, so let's head that way.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You're a regular at a floral EMPORIUM?! That's so...grown-up!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What do you think? This is where I order my bouquets whenever I need one.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Whoa... This might be my first time at such a nice florist!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Do you have an idea of what kind of flowers you want to give her?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Of course! For my little demon Lili, the perfect flowers are none other than...these!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Let me have a look... Wait, black lilies?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I figured these pure-black lilies would go perfectly with Lili's clear skin!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Knowing how hard she practiced, Lili's gonna shine today at her recital. Let's celebrate with these pure-black lilies!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'd prefer getting some red roses personally, but...if this is what you think she wants, then I trust your judgment!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Now that we have our present, we can head over to the concert hall without a worry in the world!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh heh heh... Just you wait, Lili! We're coming for you!
